channel.title: Can't get off the train after arrival at the beginning
channel.description:
Good work, guys! Good old HL looking really great now.
But: after arriving at the beginning, there's no security man coming and letting me off the train. Waited really long... can't even start playing, though.
Thanks for answers!
[b]EDIT:[/b] wrote this at 1 am... read it one more time now and saw that it sounds like a crying angry sarcastic child. Sorry, wasn't intended. There's really a great work done... I think everything works just fine except of this stupid bug.

item.title: Can't get off the train after arrival at the beginning
item.dc:creator: XThe_GManX
item.description:
Guys, the most straight forward temporary fix would be to go to the console, activate the cheats and then use no-clip.
But try unninstalling Black mesa and installing again.
To activate the console, go to Options -> Keyboard -> Search for the key that’s used to open the console (change it if you have to) and bring up the console, in it type “sv_cheats 1” hit enter and then “noclip”.
Get off the train and go directly into the airlock. Then write “noclip” again to get back to normal.

Haven’t heard of that bug before. Did the game get installed into the sourcemods/BMS folder? (exactly like that?) Most of the bugs involving strange game behavior, missing textures, or other issues related to content are because of trying to install into a custom folder that is not the default folder listed in the installer.
